channel.title: Client Issue
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/1zbfmdi.png[/img]
What would the problem be? I tried to figure it out. Just couldnt.

item.title: Client Issue
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

lol space:

I did realise that -.- But the problem wasn’t that LOL. It was because the cache had no mapConfig.txt file. dipshits. Don’t try to hate when you don’t even know what the problem is.

I don’t know what the error is? I read the error clearly, unlike you. The client was trying to download the cache, and the file it downloaded was empty. So upon extraction it threw an error because there was nothing to extract. The missing mapconfig file would have thrown another error. Like this one:

VirginPk is loading.. java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\VirginPkCache\Maps\mapConfig.txt (The system c annot find the path specified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(FileInputStream.java:138) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(FileInputStream.java:97) at java.io.FileReader.<init>(FileReader.java:58) at client.setNewMaps(client.java:133) at client.startUp(client.java:9376) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:6279) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:724)

kthxbai

Read full topic
